item.title: When people attack Monkey Archers = Errors
item.dc:creator: @happy2help happy2help
item.description:
@happy2help wrote:

i think its cus ure attacking an npc that is talking, remove the text

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1456) { if (misc.random2(30) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); npcs[i].textUpdate = "players Online: " + players; } }

Read full topic
item.source: When people attack Monkey Archers = Errors

item.title: When people attack Monkey Archers = Errors
item.dc:creator: @Simply_Z3R0 Simply Z3R0
item.description:
@Simply_Z3R0 wrote:

Kay, so tested some stuff… my friend and I massed with mage on a black drag with 5k hp and it died we didn’t get the error.

Then we went to the shop place and attacked the shopkeepers with mage - no error.
Then I attacked a shopkeeper that talks and I got the error.

When someone attacks one of these monkey archers… everyone on server gets booted and gets this error on the MoparScape client not the runserver:

The monkey archers say how many players are online and are standing on the little porches (like in RuneScape at Ape-Atoll) and you have to noclip to walk up there…
Also they drop stuff and it isn’t in the NPCDrops folder

What could the problem be…?

Also I searched for the monkey archers ID in NPCHandler, here's the things I found:
[code]					if (npcs[i].npcType == 1456) {
						if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                                                        int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "players Online:  " + players;
						}
					}[/code]

[code]if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1456) {
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomMOAR(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}[/code]

[code]                                               if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1456) {
                                               p.stillgfx(76, p.absY, p.absX);
                                               hitDiff = 2 + misc.random(24); 
                                               }[/code]

This is the monkey in AutoSpawn (It had 0hp and showed 200, I changed to 200 but it still does the error so that isn't it)
[code]npc = 1456	Monkey_Archer			86	200[/code]

and then this is them in autospawn:
[code]spawn = 1456	2756	2789	0	0	0	0	0	2	Monkey Archer
spawn = 1456	2752	2782	0	0	0	0	0	2	Monkey Archer
spawn = 1456	2754	2778	0	0	0	0	0	2	Monkey Archer
spawn = 1456	2761	2778	0	0	0	0	0	2	Monkey Archer
spawn = 1456	2765	2779	0	0	0	0	0	2	Monkey Archer
spawn = 1456	2767	2784	0	0	0	0	0	2	Monkey Archer
spawn = 1456	2762	2793	0	0	0	0	0	2	Monkey Archer
spawn = 1456	2774	2787	0	0	0	0	0	2	Monkey Archer
spawn = 1456	2772	2781	0	0	0	0	0	2	Monkey Archer
spawn = 1456	2774	2787	0	0	0	0	0	2	Monkey Archer
spawn = 1456	2777	2790	0	0	0	0	0	2	Monkey Archer
spawn = 1456	2780	2773	0	0	0	0	0	2	Monkey Archer
spawn = 1456	2770	2774	0	0	0	0	0	2	Monkey Archer
spawn = 1456	2785	2768	0	0	0	0	0	2	Monkey Archer[/code]

I know I put alot but I wanted to provide as much ifnormation to solve this problem..

Read full topic
